item.title: MKI
item.description: Our popular brand in Bangladesh is MKI. Under this brand, SCCIL offers superior quality cables, and LED lights in Bangladesh. Our coaxial cables braiding quality is best and we ensure best quality Copper core.

item.title: Red Dragon

item.title: Smart Cil
